official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Sugar Ray Robinson should be recognized for his athletic achievements and commitment to young people.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Sugar Ray Robinson should be recognized as one of history's greatest professional boxers.
